00032 #ifndef __LWIP_DEBUG_H__
00033 #define __LWIP_DEBUG_H__
00034 
00035 #include "arch/cc.h"
00036 
00044 #define DBG_LEVEL_OFF     0
00045 #define DBG_LEVEL_WARNING 1  /* bad checksums, dropped packets, ... */
00046 #define DBG_LEVEL_SERIOUS 2  /* memory allocation failures, ... */
00047 #define DBG_LEVEL_SEVERE  3  /* */ 
00048 #define DBG_MASK_LEVEL    3
00049 
00051 #define DBG_ON  0x80U
00052 
00053 #define DBG_OFF 0x00U
00054 
00056 #define DBG_TRACE   0x40U
00057 
00058 #define DBG_STATE   0x20U
00059 
00060 #define DBG_FRESH   0x10U
00061 
00062 #define DBG_HALT    0x08U
00063 
00064 #ifdef LWIP_DEBUG
00065 # ifndef LWIP_NOASSERT
00066 #  define LWIP_ASSERT(x,y) do { if(!(y)) LWIP_PLATFORM_ASSERT(x); } while(0)
00067 # else
00068 #  define LWIP_ASSERT(x,y) 
00069 # endif
00070 
00073 #  define LWIP_DEBUGF(debug,x) do { if (((debug) & DBG_ON) && ((debug) & DBG_TYPES_ON) && (((debug) & DBG_MASK_LEVEL) >= DBG_MIN_LEVEL)) { LWIP_PLATFORM_DIAG(x); if ((debug) & DBG_HALT) while(1); } } while(0)
00074 #  define LWIP_ERROR(x)   do { LWIP_PLATFORM_DIAG(x); } while(0)  
00075 #else /* LWIP_DEBUG */
00076 #  define LWIP_ASSERT(x,y) 
00077 #  define LWIP_DEBUGF(debug,x) 
00078 #  define LWIP_ERROR(x)  
00079 #endif /* LWIP_DEBUG */
00080 
00081 #endif /* __LWIP_DEBUG_H__ */
00082
